name: AS_CO_UT_rejectCdtWhereNullFields
description: Removes CDT indices where any of the passed fields are null (acts as an OR filter)
sail_code:
cast(
  typeof(ri!cdt),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectCdtByMultipleFields(
    cdt: ri!cdt,
    fields: ri!fields,
    values: repeat(count(ri!fields), null)
  )
)
